pages.text: Affects all non-fury spells. Affected spells cooldown and mana cost are increased by 25%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_lethality)Path of Lethality$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepters hunger for combat has reduced its ability to cast other spells. Imbues onto the Dangerous Scepter and persists on the Path of Lethality
